message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, as I'm sure you'll agree this is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice.  Let's be reasonable. How about a 55/45 split my way?
Let's be fair and split the money evenly. I understand your desire to have more, but after your rejection, I'm not willing to give you any more than 50%.
Alice, we're running out of time!  I'll take a slight hit from my previous offer, but 60/40 is the best you'll get. Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
